channel.title: Hosted Private Cloud Status - Incident History

item.title: [EU][Hosted Private Cloud] - vSphere maintenance notification
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Aug 11, 07:00 UTC  -  Aug 14, 16:00 UTC

Aug 6, 21:54 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer.

This may temporarily affect availability.

Start time : 11/08/2025 07:00 UTC
End time : 14/08/2025 16:00 UTC
Service impact : During the maintenance, vSphere won't be accessible and hosts will be put in maintenance mode for 1 hour.
vMotion will be performed if it has Virtual machines in it.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on our vSphere offer.
An individual communication will be done to inform customers.
Customers can reschedule the operation through the manager.

Thank you for your understanding

item.title: [EU/CA][Hosted Private Cloud] - vSphere maintenance notification
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Aug 11, 07:00 UTC  -  Aug 14, 16:00 UTC

Jul 31, 22:36 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private cloud offer.

This may temporarily affect availability.

Start time : 11/08/2025 07:00 UTC
End time : 14/08/2025 16:00 UTC
Service impact : vSphere not accessible for 1h and hosts will be put in maintenance mode during the maintenance and a vMotion will be performed if it has Virtual machines in it.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an upgrade for vSphere offer.
An individual communication will be done to inform customers and you can reschedule through the manager.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [RBX][VMware Private Cloud] - Datastore maintenance notification
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Aug 11, 07:00 UTC  -  Aug 21, 16:00 UTC

Jul 11, 09:01 UTC
Update - This maintenance has been re-scheduled.
Below you can find new information regarding the operation.

As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer.

This may temporarily affect availability.

Start time : 11/08/2025 07:00 UTC
End time : 21/08/2025 16:00 UTC
Service impact : You may experience a micro cut if the customer is writing a lot on their datastore.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on multiple storage servers.

Thank you for your understanding.

Jul 2, 04:23 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer.

This may temporarily affect availability.

Start time : 15/07/2025 07:00 UTC
End time : 17/07/2025 16:00 UTC
Service impact : You may experience a micro cut if the customer is writing a lot on their datastore.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on multiple storage servers.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [RBX7][Managed vSphere] - Host incident notification
item.description:
Aug 7, 18:55 UTC
Resolved - We are pleased to inform you that the incident affecting our Managed vSphere offer in the specific racks R719B10/R719B11 has been resolved.

Start time : 07/08/2025 14:01 UTC
End time : 06/08/2025 18:52 UTC
Root Cause : This incident was caused by a cooling system issue.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Aug 7, 18:07 UTC
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Aug 7, 17:43 UTC
Update - We are continuing to work on a fix for this issue.

Aug 7, 17:42 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Aug 7, 17:01 UTC
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Aug 7, 16:10 UTC
Identified - We are currently experiencing an ongoing incident. We have determined the origin of the issue affecting our Managed vSphere offer in the specific racks R719B10/R719B11.

Here are some supplementary details :

Start time : 07/08/2025 14:01 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Some hosts are unavailable in the racks R719B10/R719B11.
Customers impact : Some customers cannot access their hosts in these racks.
Root cause : This incident is caused by a cooling system issue.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

Aug 7, 16:04 UTC
Investigating - We are currently experiencing an event affecting our Managed vSphere offer in the specific racks R719B10/R719B11.

Start time : 07/08/2025 14:01 UTC

Our teams are fully committed to investigating this issue and working towards a resolution as soon as possible. As investigations are ongoing, we will share any new findings or updates with you as soon as possible.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Ongoing Actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident to fix it. 

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.
